title: #349:  Let's Talk Turkey About VPR
description:
With Thanksgiving right around the corner, we must reflect on all the things we have to be thankful for: Stassi, Shannon, Vicki, Tamra, Kristen, Scheana, Bravo, TV... the list goes on.

Come listen to us express our utmost gratitude to Real Housewives of Orange County and Vanderpump Rules.

00:00:00 - Intro
00:06:31 - Clear the Flem
00:15:28 - Real Housewives of Orange County
01:01:40 - Vanderpump Rules

author: watchwhatcrappens@gmail.com (Ben Mandelker & Ronnie Karam)
